trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Enable-PSBreakpoint
trans-unit.target: Enable-PSBreakpoint

trans-unit.source: Enable-PSBreakpoint
trans-unit.target: Enable-PSBreakpoint

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Enables the breakpoints in the current console.
trans-unit.target: 启用当前控制台中的断点。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: Id (Default)
trans-unit.target: Id （默认值）

trans-unit.source: Breakpoint
trans-unit.target: 断点

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The Enable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet re-enables disabled breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: Enable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet 可重新启用已禁用的断点。

trans-unit.source: You can use it to enable all breakpoints, or you can specify breakpoints by submitting breakpoint objects or breakpoint IDs.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用它启用所有断点，或者可以通过提交断点对象或断点 ID 指定断点。

trans-unit.source: A breakpoint is a point in a script where execution stops temporarily so that you can examine the instructions in the script.
trans-unit.target: 断点是脚本中的一个点，将在其中暂时停止执行脚本，从而使你可以检查脚本中的指令。

trans-unit.source: Newly created breakpoints are automatically enabled, but you can disable them by using the Disable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的断点将自动启用，但你可以通过使用 Disable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet 来禁用它们。

trans-unit.source: Technically, this cmdlet changes the value of the Enabled property of a breakpoint object to True.
trans-unit.target: 在技术上，该 cmdlet 将断点对象的 Enabled 属性值更改为 True。

trans-unit.source: Enable-PSBreakpoint is one of several cmdlets designed for debugging Windows PowerShell scripts.
trans-unit.target: Enable-PSBreakpoint 是专门用于调试 Windows PowerShell 脚本的多个 cmdlet 之一。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Windows PowerShell debugger, see about_Debuggers.
trans-unit.target: 有关 Windows PowerShell 调试程序的详细信息，请参阅 about_Debuggers。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: This command enables all breakpoints in the current console.
trans-unit.target: 此命令启用当前控制台中的所有断点。

trans-unit.source: You can abbreviate the command as "gbp | ebp".
trans-unit.target: 你可以将该命令缩写为“gbp | ebp”。

trans-unit.source: This command enables breakpoints with breakpoint IDs 0, 1, and 5.
trans-unit.target: 此命令启用端点 ID 为 0、1 和 5 的断点。

trans-unit.source: These commands re-enable a breakpoint that has been disabled.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令可重新启用已禁用的断点。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the Set-PSBreakpoint cmdlet to create a breakpoint on the "Name" variable in the Sample.ps1 script.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令使用 Set-PSBreakpoint cmdlet 在 Sample.ps1 脚本的“Name”变量中创建断点。

trans-unit.source: Then, it saves the breakpoint object in the $b variable.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它将断点对象保存在 $b 变量中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the Disable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet to disable the new breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 Disable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet 禁用新断点。

trans-unit.source: It uses a pipeline operator (|) to send the breakpoint object in $b to the Disable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet, and it uses the PassThru parameter of Disable-PSBreakpoint to display the disabled breakpoint object.
trans-unit.target: 它使用管道运算符 (|) 将 $b 中的断点对象发送到 Disable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet，并使用 Disable-PSBreakpoint 的 PassThru 参数显示已禁用的断点对象。

trans-unit.source: This lets you verify that the value of the Enabled property of the breakpoint object is False.
trans-unit.target: 这使你可以验证断点对象的 Enabled 属性的值是否为 False。

trans-unit.source: The third command uses the Enable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet to re-enable the breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 第三个命令使用 Enable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet 重新启用断点。

trans-unit.source: It uses a pipeline operator (|) to send the breakpoint object in $b to the Enable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet, and it uses the PassThru parameter of Enable-PSBreakpoint to display the breakpoint object.
trans-unit.target: 它使用管道运算符 (|) 将 $b 中的断点对象发送到 Enable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet，并使用 Enable-PSBreakpoint 的 PassThru 参数显示断点对象。

trans-unit.source: This lets you verify that the value of the Enabled property of the breakpoint object is True.
trans-unit.target: 这使你可以验证断点对象的 Enabled 属性的值是否为 False。

trans-unit.source: The results are shown in the following sample output.
trans-unit.target: 结果显示在下面的示例输出中。

trans-unit.source: These commands enable a set of breakpoints by specifying their breakpoint objects.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令通过指定它们的断点对象来启用一组断点。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the Get-PSBreakpoint cmdlet to get the breakpoints and saves them in the $b variable.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令使用 Get-PSBreakpoint cmdlet 获取断点，并将它们保存在 $b 变量中。

trans-unit.source: The second command uses the Enable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet and its Breakpoint parameter to enable the breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令使用 Enable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet 及其 Breakpoint 参数来启用断点。

trans-unit.source: This command is the equivalent of "enable-psbreakpoint -id 3, 5".
trans-unit.target: 此命令等效于“enable-psbreakpoint -id 3, 5”。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Breakpoint
trans-unit.target: 断点处

trans-unit.source: Specifies the breakpoints to enable.
trans-unit.target: 指定要启用的断点。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains breakpoint objects or a command that gets breakpoint objects, such as a Get-PSBreakpoint command.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个包含断点对象的变量，或可获取断点对象的命令（如 Get-PSBreakpoint 命令）。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe breakpoint objects to Enable-PSBreakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以通过管道将断点对象传递给 Enable-PSBreakpoint。

trans-unit.source: -Id
trans-unit.target: -Id

trans-unit.source: Enables breakpoints that have the specified breakpoint IDs.
trans-unit.target: 启用具有指定断点 ID 的断点。

trans-unit.source: The default value is all breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为所有断点。

trans-unit.source: Enter the IDs or a variable that contains the IDs.
trans-unit.target: 输入 ID 或包含 ID 的变量。

trans-unit.source: (You cannot pipe IDs to Enable-PSBreakpoint.) To find the ID of a breakpoint, use the Get-PSBreakpoint cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: （无法通过管道将 ID 传递给 Enable-PSBreakpoint。）若要查找某个断点的 ID，请使用 Get-PSBreakpoint cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Returns an object representing the enabled breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示已启用的断点的对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此 cmdlet 将不产生任何输出。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 运行 cmdlet 之前提示你进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 未运行。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.Breakpoint
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.Breakpoint

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a breakpoint object to Enable-PSBreakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 可通过管道将断点对象传递给 Enable-PSBreakpoint。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None or System.Management.Automation.Breakpoint
trans-unit.target: 无或 System.Management.Automation.Breakpoint

trans-unit.source: When you use the PassThru parameter, Enable-PSBreakpoint returns a breakpoint object that represent that breakpoint that was enabled.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用 PassThru 参数时，Enable-PSBreakpoint 将返回一个表示已启用该断点的断点对象。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The Enable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet does not generate an error if you try to enable a breakpoint that is already enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试启用一个已启用的断点，则 Enable-PSBreakpoint cmdlet 不会生成错误。

trans-unit.source: As such, you can enable all breakpoints without error, even when only a few are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 因此，即使仅有少数断点处于禁用状态，你也可以启用所有断点而不发生错误。

trans-unit.source: Breakpoints are enabled when you create them by using the Set-PSBreakpoint cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 Set-PSBreakpoint cmdlet 来创建断点时，将启用断点。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to enable newly created breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 不需要启用新创建的断点。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.target: Disable-PSBreakpoint

trans-unit.target: Get-PSBreakpoint

trans-unit.target: Get-PSCallStack

trans-unit.source: Remove-PSBreakpoint
trans-unit.target: Remove-PSBreakpoint

trans-unit.source: Set-PSBreakpoint
trans-unit.target: Set-PSBreakpoint

trans-unit.target: about_Debuggers
